/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, on the other hand, add a touch of green to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sun casts its warm glow on the scene, illuminating the buildings and casting long shadows that add depth to the image.
